targets.query: SELECT "healthiness" FROM "reading"."rrp"."GYR_light_3" order by time desc limit 1
SELECT "healthiness" FROM "reading"."rrp"."GYR_light_3" where $timeFilter

SELECT
    daily_last_total_utilization_hours AS total_utilization_hours,
    24 - daily_last_total_utilization_hours AS untotal_utilization_hours,
    daily_last_total_utilization_hours / 8 AS utilization_8_hours_percent,
    daily_last_total_utilization_hours / 12 AS utilization_12_hours_percent,
    daily_last_total_utilization_hours / 16 AS utilization_16_hours_percent
FROM (
    SELECT
        LAST(TodayOEE_1) AS daily_last_total_utilization_hours
    FROM Siemens
    GROUP BY time(1d, -8h)
)
SELECT "TodayOEE_1" FROM "reading"."rrp"."Siemens" where $timeFilter order by time desc limit 1
SELECT "TodayOEE_1" FROM "reading"."rrp"."Siemens" where $timeFilter

SELECT mean("30003") FROM "Modbus" 
WHERE "30003" > 300 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h, -8h) fill(null)
SELECT "healthiness" FROM "reading"."rrp"."GYR_light_1" where $timeFilter order by time desc limit 1
SELECT "healthiness" FROM "reading"."rrp"."GYR_light_1" where $timeFilter

SELECT
    daily_last_total_utilization_hours AS total_utilization_hours,
    24-  daily_last_total_utilization_hours AS untotal_utilization_hours,
    daily_last_total_utilization_hours / 8 AS utilization_8_hours_percent,
    daily_last_total_utilization_hours / 12 AS utilization_12_hours_percent,
    daily_last_total_utilization_hours / 16 AS utilization_16_hours_percent
FROM (
    SELECT
        LAST(total_utilization_hours) AS daily_last_total_utilization_hours
    FROM FX3G_utilization
    GROUP BY time(1d, -8h)
)
SELECT "total_utilization_hours" FROM "reading"."rrp"."FX3G_utilization" where $timeFilter order by time desc limit 1
SELECT "total_utilization_hours" FROM "reading"."rrp"."FX3G_utilization" where $timeFilter
SELECT "30003" FROM "reading"."rrp"."Modbus-1" where $timeFilter

SELECT mean("30003") FROM "Modbus-1" 
WHERE "30003" > 4 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2h, -8h) fill(null)

SELECT max("30003") FROM "Modbus-1" 
WHERE "30003" > 4.5 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h, -8h) fill(null)

SELECT mean("30003") FROM "Modbus-1" 
WHERE "30003" > 4 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h, -8h) fill(null)
